title: Flipkart Reviews Scraper
description: Extract product reviews from Flipkart. Provide a Flipkart product review URL to scrape reviews with ratings, text, author, date, and more. Fast and reliable with automatic pagination.

startUrl.title: Product Review URL
startUrl.description: Direct link to a Flipkart product review page (e.g., https://www.flipkart.com/product-name/product-reviews/itmXXXXXXXXXX)

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of reviews
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of reviews to collect per product. Set to a reasonable number to avoid long run times.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety cap on the number of review pages to visit per product

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for Flipkart.
